name: Marzia lost in space
description:
A short story about Marzia shipping cargo to some port,
she decides to take a short break after going FTL for a while.

This is a short visual novel I made as an attempt to make a game for steam.
This story is not based on reality, but more of what it is like to live a life in the future,
and what may happen in the future, as in this character Marzia has to live the struggles of
trying to pay her bills while not getting killed by atleast anything.

I tried my best to make this game as artistically pleasing and good enough
to understand the story, I hope you will enjoy it!


Features[/i]
> The gameplay time may be a little short (5-15 minutes)
> A story with at least 3 endings
> And nothing else...
